CustomField.description: Used to Identify all the low power stations that have a facility status of CP Off Air & have not filed a displacement request and have not been assigned a commencement date on channels above 37 and check the box.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This box is checked when this criteria is met- Lp's with a facility status of CP Off Air, who have not filed a displacement request, and have not been assigned a commencement date on channels above 37.
CustomField.label: CP Off Air Status
